TopicTitle: Game bringing chunk of the KSP station with me into space

Articles.Content:
Please see the below clip

unsure specifically what caused this issue but i am assuming it is some combination of going to tracking centre and going to the overview section has caused some of the land mass to now be moved with me into space as the ship still acts as if it is in space.
